H3.text: where is the arizona cardinals stadium located. Glendale

A4.text: The team plays its home games at State Farm Stadium in Glendale, a suburb northwest of the state capital of Phoenix.

A5.text: In 2006, the team moved to their current home field in suburban Glendale.
